subject: 6 + r shifter not recognizing
description_text:
Hello,

I believe there is a issue with my shifter I just purchased on Ali as it is not connecting. I have tried other cables, ports and other computer get same error. Image of error below.
Help would be appreciated.

Thanks
Jasper

conversations.body_text: Also my shakers (non pro) show connected in simhub but do not vibrate when I test channels
Hi Jasper,  You can plug the device directly into the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your PC, or try using a USB hub with independent power supply.

﻿ Hello, I was away for holiday and am now back. I tried again with usb 3.0 directly from my laptop and from a powered usb hub, restarting computer same result and my shakers show they are connected but cannot activate. My pedals register though. Help would be appreciated, I believe there is something wrong with the shifter, maybe it is possible software issue for shaker as pedals work but I do not know. Help would be appreciated as these are Christmas presents that I have not gotten to use as they do not work yet. Thanks, Jasper

Hi Jasper,  Could you please provide your AliExpress order number? I’ll check the order details first. Also, to help us identify the issue quickly, please send a few clear photos/screenshots of:    The pedal controller box (please include the ports/connectors);    The haptic motors and the wiring/installation;    The power supply adapter (including the specification label);    A full screenshot of the SIMSONN Manager window (showing the version, device detection, and the current settings page).    Once I review these, I can pinpoint the cause and guide you to the correct solution.
